channel.title: Need help on a few questions!
channel.description:
ok questions no1 is
i cant use mage atks on monsters like guards (there the onle monsters ive seen and tried on) does mage atks onle work in wild no1 is eva in mi world can sum1 pls say y or give me a good world. like lvl 21 guards hit like loads 2s an stuf on me it wont let me use pots and duelinmg rings etc. the wildi sighn isnt up when i go in wild. how 2 spawn monsters
pls help me im new 2 the game started like 2 hours ago pls help! :|
